description:
When the Bookmarks window is the active window, command-N (or Control-N) should
open a new browser window, but doesn't.

This used to work, and in the past couple of weeks disappeared. (I just checked
nightly build 2002032113 and the keyboard accelerator works just fine, even
though the menu commands aren't present.)

This is important to me, because I leave the bookmarks window open all of the
time, with browser windows closed, and I keep tripping over this missing
keyboard command.
summary: accel+N doesn't work when Bookmarks is active window
